page.title: 03Hazel Crook End,Allerton
page.content: {Primary Land Cover: Farmland-Intensively managed grassland ;Sown & fertilized grassland used for pasture or for cutting as grass,silage or hay. {Family Life: Twenty minutes to nearest bus service or shops.The inhabitants of this area are farmers. {Ameneties: The one amenety found in this square is an electricity power sub-station. {Employment:} Most of the people living here must either travel out of this square for work or create their own private business.The farms in this square are one example of a private business.
